title: React for Beginners

title: Advanced JavaScript
description: Deep dive into closures, async programming, and ES6+ features.

description: Analyze datasets using pandas, NumPy, and Matplotlib.

description: Hands-on ML with scikit-learn and real-world datasets.

description: Explore the fundamentals of artificial intelligence.

description: Learn CI/CD, containerization, and deployment pipelines.

description: Manage containers at scale using Kubernetes.

description: Understand security threats and best practices.

description: Learn how to identify vulnerabilities in systems ethically.
